#summary Your first Spock specification.

{{{
import org.junit.runner.RunWith
import spock.lang.*

@Speck
@RunWith(Sputnik)
class HelloSpock {
  def "can you figure out what I'm up to?"() {
    expect:
    name.size() == size

    where:
    name << ["Kirk", "Spock", "Scotty"]
    size << [4, 5, 6]
  }
}
}}}
